00009 void BrowseVersesDelegate::paint(QPainter *painter, const QStyleOptionViewItem &option, const QModelIndex &index) const
00010 {
00011     if (option.state & QStyle::State_Selected)
00012         painter->fillRect(option.rect, option.palette.highlight());
00013 
00014     painter->save();
00015 
00016     if (option.state & QStyle::State_Selected)
00017         painter->setBrush(option.palette.highlightedText());
00018     else
00019         painter->setBrush(QBrush(Qt::red));
00020 
00021     painter->drawText(option.rect, Qt::AlignLeft, index.data().toString());
00022 
00023     painter->restore();
00024 }

00026 QSize BrowseVersesDelegate::sizeHint(const QStyleOptionViewItem& option, const QModelIndex& index) const
00027 {
00028     return QSize(option.rect.width() + 10, option.rect.height() + 10);
